title: BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Sees H1 Underlying Profit To Be Lower Than PCP
text:
BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Sees H1 Underlying Profit To Be Lower Than PCP

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 10:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Sees H1 Underlying Profit To Be Lower Than PCP Oct 9 (Reuters) - Flight Centre Travel Group Ltd : * RECORDED STRONG GROWTH IN ONLINE LEISURE SALES IN AUSTRALIA DURING Q1 (Q1) OF 2020 FISCAL YEAR * THOMAS COOK'S COLLAPSE HAD A MINIMAL IMPACT ON FLT AND ITS CUSTOMERS, BUT CO EXPECTED TO INCUR $7 MILLION IN COSTS * SEES UNDERLYING PROFIT TO BE BELOW PCP DURING H1, LIKELY TO BE WEIGHTED TOWARDS H2 OF FY20

BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Sees H1 Underlying Profit To Be Lower Than PCP
description: BRIEF-Flight Centre Travel Group Sees H1 Underlying Profit To Be Lower Than PCP
